strings.string: Please input your USTVnow login details below:
Please register a [COLOR red]FREE[/COLOR] account at http://watch.ustvnow.com before continuing.
Please Note: Be sure to use your email address, not social media registration!
Are you sure you want to delete this recording?
Are you sure you want to record this show?
Connection FAILED! Please check your login credentials and try again.
Recording schedule failed. Have you already scheduled this recording? Be sure that you have a DVR account or enough DVR points.
Recording deletion failed. Have you set this show to recurring recording? Recurring recording must be turned off to delete a scheduled recording.
Are you sure you want to turn off recurring recording?
Recurring recording has been turned off.
Recurring recording has not been turned off.
Are you sure you want to turn on recurring recording?
Recurring recording has been turned on.
Recurring recording has not been turned on. Be sure that you have a DVR account or enough DVR points.
Would you like to turn on recurring recording?
Account Activation Required! Please check the email that you used to sign up to activate your account.
Account Renewal Required! Please visit watch.ustvnow.com to renew your account.
Live TV Quality (HD for Free Accounts first 45 days)
Are you sure you want increase the Stream Quality? This will change the quality for all Live TV streams.
Are you sure you want decrease the Stream Quality? This will change the quality for all Live TV streams.
Are you sure you want increase the Stream Quality? This will change the quality for all Recordings streams.
Are you sure you want decrease the Stream Quality? This will change the quality for all Recordings streams.
Enable Live TV Extended Context Menu
Welcome to the new version of USTVnow Plus! This version includes a ton of new features including Live TV Recording!
It is recommended to restart Kodi to ensure that all features are activated and available.
Should you require any assistance, feel free to visit http://forums.tvaddons.ag for addon support.
Thank you for trying USTVnow Plus!
Should you require any assistance, feel free to visit
Select 'Alternate' if you are having issues with streams dropping:
Check this option to force clear your current token:
